roleset.name: become bad, becoming bad or worse
roleset.note: DEGENERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'degenerate' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from degenerate.01-v predicate notes)
DEGENERATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with degenerate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from degeneration.01-n)

role.descr: causer of something becoming bad (rarely or never occuring)

example.name: usually with just end point
example.text: Demonstrations-1 are particularly apt *trace*-1 to degenerate into criminal conduct when they leave the site of the grievance and become mobile.

example.name: explicit start state
example.text: Customers degenerate from borrowers to savers/investors.

example.name: Arg1 and Arg4
example.text: The meeting's degeneration into an all-out brawl disappointed the hosting panel.
